content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Now it’s time to meet the team you’re going to work with. In the slides below you’ll get familiar with the team’s org structure, and who will be the main stakeholders in your everyday working life. Our big program is divided into streams or teams where each team is led by the Team Leader and consists of developers, case and product owner. Big teams also have a dedicated Scrum master. All the QAs are reporting to QA Leads and all our Automation QAs are reporting to AQA lead accordingly. The offshore teams mostly report to offshore Delivery Manager who in his turn report to the onsite principle Delivery Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please, click on the slides show below to get more details on main EPAM stakeholders and their responsibilities. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":351023,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4a812987-7539-40a0-81b4-43c05b39ef9d/EPAM stakeholders and their responsibilities.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4a812987-7539-40a0-81b4-43c05b39ef9d/EPAM stakeholders and their responsibilities.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"EPAM stakeholders and their responsibilities.pdf\",\"name\":\"EPAM stakeholders and their responsibilities.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"4a812987-7539-40a0-81b4-43c05b39ef9d\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Additionally, please meet the clients team you most probably will be working or getting in touch with during your tenure with KDP. Each team has its own Product Manager or Technical Owner represented from the client side. On the slide below we’ve listed the main key client contact points.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":429917,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d29e2f15-5a2f-4c66-855e-dde288aa0a03/Keurig3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d29e2f15-5a2f-4c66-855e-dde288aa0a03/Keurig3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Keurig3.PNG\",\"name\":\"Keurig3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d29e2f15-5a2f-4c66-855e-dde288aa0a03\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":542.9358879882093},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
